creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Multiple configurations for lucene are not written to cocoon.xconf because of a
"remove" statement in the index_manager_index.xconf xconf patch file.

Created attachment 17032
Patches src/webapp/lenya/pubs/default/config/index_manager_index.xconf

Removes the remove statement in the xconf patch file otherwise all index
declarations are removed when xconf is applied.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
this file no longer exists. i'm setting this to "fixed"... can somebody review
this issue? maybe the basic idea is still relevant somewhere - if not, please close.
creator: nettings@apache.org
